summary: A small town, desperate to recover from hard economic times, is under threat when voracious Snakehead fish mutate and survive previous lake chemical poisonings.
cast: Alistair Abell|Doug Abrahams|Carol Alt|Bruce Boxleitner|Juliana Wimbles|Brenda Campbell|Gardiner Millar|William B. Davis|Bro Gilbert|P. Lynn Johnson|Gary Jones|Chad Krowchuk|Matthew MacCaull|Don MacKay|Ryan McDonell|Darren Moore|Chelan Simmons|Manoj Sood|Sylvesta Stuart|Scott Swanson
title: El lago
